bibl.title: The Legacy of Egypt. Second edition.
bibl.seg: Harris J.R. (Ed.), The Legacy of Egypt. Second edition.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1971, 8°, xi-510 pp., 10 figg., 1 front. et 24 pll.

C.R. par Bernard Boyaval REA 76 (1974) pp. 175-177. - Erhart Graefe, ChrEg 47 (1972) Nos 93-94, pp. 110-114. - J. Gwyn Griffiths, CR N.S., 25 (1975) pp. 307-308. - Franz Hampl, AnzAW 27 (1974) coll. 213-216. - Michel Muszynski, Latomus 32 (1973) p. 681. - J. Pegueroles, StPap 13 (1974) pp. 131-132.
